verbose_text: HDACis induce cell cycle arrest, differentiation, and/or apoptosis of CRC cells [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR]; the HDACis butyrate and trichostatin A (TSA), which induce apoptosis in CRC cells in vitro, hyperactivate Wnt transcriptional activity in these cells [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR].
evidence: HDACis induce cell cycle arrest, differentiation
